Frequently Asked Questions about Gym Memberships

How can I start my gym membership?

Simply give our team a call and share your fitness goals. We'll quickly create a customized plan to turn your aspirations into reality.

How can I manage my guest invitations to the gym?

Our user-friendly online guest management system has a dedicated "Invites" feature that allows you (or our team) to easily handle guest invites.

Is it possible to change my fitness goals timeline?

Feel free to approach us, and we'll make every effort to accommodate your request.

What are the billing procedures at the gym?

To reserve your membership, we require a 50% down-payment and the remaining 50% payment is due 24 hours before your chosen start date.

Can I receive an invoice for my gym membership purchase?

Yes, we've got you covered. Just reach out to our dedicated customer support team and make sure to have your order ID handy.

Wondering about something else? Don't hesitate to reach out!

Stumped with finding the information you're after? We understand. Let's have a conversation then.

Want some assistance right away? Join our chat and let's connect.

Get in touch with our Knowledgeable Gym Staff

Stay proactive about your fitness journey and gain insights into our wide range of services by connecting with us on social media or sending us a direct message.
